scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a Christmas card, December 18, 1939, with envelope, from Edna Turpinof Richmond, Virginia, to Mrs. Clem Heth, Blacksburg, Virginia, with a sketch on the front of the card by M. Dashiellof the old Sixth Street Market, Richmond, Virginia. Miss Turpin shares how much she enjoys the sketches of Mrs. Dashiell and that she might be in Christiansburgfor a few days over Christmas when she hopes to see Mrs. Heth.
